name: Thug Kitchen's Pad Thai
ingredients: 2 cups thinly slice cabbage (red or green)
instructions: Mix together all the stuff for the sauce.
Cook noodles according to the package directions, drain and rinse with cold water.
Meanwhile, chop up the broccoli into quarter-sized pieces and prepare the remaining vegetables and herbs.

Heat oil over medium heat in a big wok or skillet. Add shallots and fry until they start to char around the edges. Add broccoli, continue to stir for another 2 minutes (until broccoli starts to char).
Add garlic and fry for another 30 seconds. Then add noodles, 1/3 cup of sauce and stir to cover.
Fold in the tofu and continue stirring for another minute until sauce is absorbed
Add more sauce, to taste and turn off heat. Add green onions and cilantro and mix in.
Top with some combination of toppings, serve.
